interestingcomments.content:
Canon 80d + Canon Camera Connect + iPad Pro /!/ Hi everyone.

I've previously been using my iPhone 6s with my Camera Connect App to remotely view and control my canon. I saw that there was an iPad version of the app so I bought the iPad Pro. Downloaded the app. I cannot for the life of me get the iPad's version of the Camera Connect to detect my Canon 80d. Did some trouble shooting and reset all of the WiFi settings (no bluetooth on the 80d) on the camera but it still doesn't want to detect. I can connect to the wiFi that the camera is putting out but the app remains clueless. Has anyone gotten this to connect?
